effect.more_relics.greater_liandrys_torm: Increases incoming Damage and dealing damage according to the maximum health of the target per second.
effect.more_relics.greater_rage_power.de: Increases Rage and attack speed, also reduces incoming Damage taken.
Deals damage around the user when taking or dealing melee damage.
Increases Air and Lightning spell power.
effect.more_relics.lesser_earth_fire.des: Increases Earth and Fire spell power.
effect.more_relics.lesser_water_frost.de: Increases Water and Frost spell power.
effect.more_relics.medium_rage_power.des: Increases Rage and Attack Speed, but silences the caster.
effect.more_relics.superior_guardian_ang: Cant move, jump or cast spells but you're invulnerable.
effect.more_relics.superior_mikaels_bles: Clears all harmful effects when applied.
effect.more_relics.superior_zhonyas_hour: Cant move, jump or cast spells but you're invulnerable.
spell.more_relics.greater_frozen_heart.d: On taking damage: {trigger_chance} chance to reduce the attack and movement speed of nearby enemies by {bonus} for {effect_duration} seconds.
spell.more_relics.greater_kircheis_shard: On arrow hit: {trigger_chance} chance to create a electric field for {cloud_duration} seconds dealing {damage} damage.
spell.more_relics.greater_liandrys_torme: On spell hit: {trigger_chance} chance to torment the target for {effect_duration} seconds, damaging according to 3%% of the targets max health per second.
spell.more_relics.greater_madreds_bloodr: On melee hit: {trigger_chance_1} to receive increased attack speed by {bonus} and deal additional damage according to {max_health_damage} of the targets max health every hit.
spell.more_relics.greater_proc_rage.desc: Taking damage below {health_threshold} health, reduces incoming damage by {bonus}, increases rage by {bonus2} and attack speed by {bonus3} for {effect_duration} seconds.
spell.more_relics.greater_proc_rage.name: Svablod's Ritual
spell.more_relics.greater_sunfire_cape.d: On damage taken and dealt: {trigger_chance_1} to deal {max_health_damage} damage of your max health around you.
spell.more_relics.lesser_proc_air_lightn: On spell hit: {trigger_chance} chance to increase air and lightning spell power by {bonus} for {effect_duration} seconds.
spell.more_relics.lesser_proc_earth_fire: On spell hit: {trigger_chance} chance to increase earth and fire spell power by {bonus} for {effect_duration} seconds.
spell.more_relics.lesser_proc_water_fros: On spell hit: {trigger_chance} chance to increase water and frost spell power by {bonus} for {effect_duration} seconds.
Use: Increases rage by {bonus} for {effect_duration} seconds.
spell.more_relics.medium_perk_rage.descr: On melee hit: {trigger_chance} chance to get into a berserk stage for {effect_duration} seconds.
spell.more_relics.medium_perk_rage.name: Mardroeme Mushroom
On melee and spell hit: {trigger_chance_1} chance to increase lifesteal and spell vampire by {bonus} for {effect_duration} seconds.
spell.more_relics.medium_use_air_power.d: Use: Increases air spell power by {bonus} for {effect_duration} seconds.
spell.more_relics.medium_use_earth_power: Use: Increases earth spell power by {bonus} for {effect_duration} seconds.
spell.more_relics.medium_use_water_power: Use: Increases water spell power by {bonus} for {effect_duration} seconds.
spell.more_relics.superior_guardian_ange: Taking damage below {health_threshold} health, makes you invulnerable for {effect_duration} seconds and heals you for {health_percent} of your maximum health.
spell.more_relics.superior_mejais_soulst: Defeating enemies grants you spell power by {bonus}, stacking up to {effect_amplifier_cap} times for {effect_duration} seconds.
spell.more_relics.superior_mikaels_bless: Use: Heals you or the targeted ally for {heal_percent} of your max health and cleanses all harmful effects.
spell.more_relics.superior_shurelyas_bat: Use: Increase movement speed by {bonus} for {effect_duration} seconds and reduces spell cooldowns for allies.
spell.more_relics.superior_zhonyas_hourg: Use: Become invulnerable for {effect_duration} seconds, you cant move, attack or cast spells.
